title: Englands doubtfull hopes, or, Long look't for may come at last Which hath beene expected God grant that we may, once more in England see a ioyfull day. To the tune of, The princess bride.
author: White, Robert, fl. 1643.
notes: Verse - "If faith and truth were joyned hand to hand,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
